subject: Re: FW:Landing Page for ADVANTAGE PLUS
preview: Perfect! Thank you so much for your great work! I will send this to Dan this afternoon.  Kind regards,  An

full_threads.body:
Perfect! Thank you so much for your great work!
I will send this to Dan this afternoon.

Kind regards,

An

Hi An,

We have applied the changes below and we have updated the backend where you can edit the text. 
Backend - https://advantagestyling.com.au/wp-admin/post.php?post=3314&action=edit
Frontend - https://advantagestyling.com.au/advantage-plus/

Let me know if this is ok? Cheers!

Hi Joel,

Thank you for the updates. It looks good!!

Just a few more change please,

- Adjust the photo so we can see more of the lounge and coffee table underneath ? (Screenshot)
- Set the "Thank you for contacting us!" and "We will get in touch with you shortly" in two lines instead of one.
- Replace photo of bed in page 2 to photo of lounge. (See screenshot. I have just uploaded the photos)

I just wonder if I will be able to edit this page in the future myself like other landing page? I don't know coding though : )


Thank you so much Joel.
Kind regards,

An

Hi An,

We have applied the changes below. 

Let me know what you think? https://advantagestyling.com.au/advantage-plus/

Good morning Heath,

I'm still waiting for Dan for his approval to published the page.

In the meantime, could you please:
- Change the background in the last page into this photo in the screenshot. (I have uploaded this photo on media gallery)
- Set the "Thank you for contacting us!" message in the white background instead of transparent. At the moment, it get lost in the background below.
- Add comma "," after ADVANTAGE PLUS.
- Bring the word "CONTACT" down to the line below.

Thank you so much Heath!

Have a great day!

Kind regards,

An

Hi Heath,

Thank you so much Heath! Great works!

Dan, do you want Heath to publish Advantage Plus?

https://advantagestyling.com.au/advantage-plus/


Kind regards,

An

Hi An,

We have applied the changes for the logos and email stuff. 
Here's a quick link for you to check: https://advantagestyling.com.au/advantage-plus/

Let me know if you want us to publish it? Cheers!

Hi Heath,

Sorry Heath!!
Please added the function when the inquiry come through to info@advantagestyling.com.au, make it clear it's Advantage Plus and not just general inquiry.

Thanks Heath!

Kind regards,

An

Hi Heath,

It looks great! You're the best!

The form can be sent to info@advantagestyling.com.au


Just more small change, please make the logo inside the gold rectangle touch the top bar instead of having the gap. It looks like it's floating.

Thank you so much, Heath.


Kind regards,

An

Hi An,

We made some changes on the page, also where do you want to send the email when the form is submitted?

Let me know what you think? https://advantagestyling.com.au/advantage-plus/. Cheers!

Hi Heath,

Is it better if I send you the Indesign file for this landing page ?

I would like the gold rectangle to be transparent if its possible.
Logo and ratio should be kept the same as the design if you can please.

Thank you Heath!

Kind regards,

An

Hi An,

Thanks for uploading that background image. I have applied it on the page.

Let me know if this is ok?

Hi Heath,

I have just upload a few version. I'm checking it as you are coding at the moment too : )

Kind regards,

An

Hi An, 

For the first section bg image can you upload the background without the frame? 

Here's what we have right now. https://advantagestyling.com.au/advantage-plus/ (Currently in private mode: Needs to be logged in.)

Let me know what you think? Cheers!

Hi Heath,

Thank you for working on it for us.
It's looking great so far!
I have just added the background on the first page for you.
Could you please incorporate your code with that background.
My apologise for not uploading it earlier.

Kind regards,

An
@heath Let me know if this is ok? I can't find the 2 other images. https://advantagestyling.com.au/advantage-plus/

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body:
Hi An,

Sure, we will work on this for you and it should be ready mid to later this week.

FYI - It's estimated to take around 1 hour.

@joel I have attached the file that the client references in the below DropBox link in case you can't access it? Apparently she has uploaded the images you will need into the media folder. It's a single page with 3 sections. Can you please create on public page, but don't assign it to any menu until we have approval. Cheers.

Hi Heath,

Hope you’re well.

We are launching a new service called Advantage Plus and we want to create a Landing Page for it.

Could you please help us create the page based on the design here?

https://www.dropbox.com/s/nbfebcdwujicz53/Advantage%20Plus%20-%20Landing%20Page%20-%20Final.pdf?dl=0 <https://www.dropbox.com/s/nbfebcdwujicz53/Advantage%20Plus%20-%20Landing%20Page%20-%20Final.pdf?dl=0>

- The landing page URL should be: https://advantagestyling.com.au/advantage-plus/ <https://advantagestyling.com.au/advantage-plus/>
- The very fist page, Advantage Plus logo is inside the golden rectangle box.
- When scrolling down to second page, logo on the header is static and the type & the bed photo are movable up and down.
- Scrolling down to the last page, the form and the background photo are static.

I will upload the images on the website for you. Please also find the Advantage Plus logo attached in case you need to use it in the banner.

If you need any more information from our end, please give me a call.

Thank you so much Heath.

Kind regards

An Phuong Gorham
Marketing & Design Exeacutive
Advantage Property Styling

Follow us on:
<https://www.facebook.com/AdvantageStyling/> <https://www.instagram.com/advantagestyling/> <>
